trans-unit.source: Provides a slimmed down version of <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent" /> 的简化版本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class for better performance than <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent> when wait times are expected to be very short, and when the event does not cross a process boundary.
trans-unit.target: 可将此类用于更好的性能比<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>和事件不能跨越进程边界时等待时间预计很短。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> uses busy spinning for a short time while it waits for the event to become signaled.
trans-unit.target: 等待事件收到信号期间，<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> 会短暂使用忙碌旋转。

trans-unit.source: When wait times are short, spinning can be much less expensive than waiting by using wait handles.
trans-unit.target: 等待时间较短时，旋转的开销相对于使用等待句柄来进行等待的开销会少很多。

trans-unit.source: However, if the event does not become signaled within a certain period of time, <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> resorts to a regular event handle wait.
trans-unit.target: 不过，如果在特定时间段内事件没有收到信号，<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> 会求助于常规的事件句柄等待。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the use of `SpinCount` and other best practices concerning the use of this type, see [ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用有关的详细信息`SpinCount`和其他最佳实践，有关使用此类型，请参阅[ManualResetEvent 和 ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md)。

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> have completed, and Reset, which should only be used when no other threads are accessing the event.
trans-unit.target: 所有公共和受保护成员<see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />是线程安全的可同时从多个线程，Dispose 除外，它必须仅使用时使用上的所有其他操作<see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />已完成，并且将重置，这应只用于在没有其他线程访问事件时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> class with an initial state of nonsignaled.
trans-unit.target: 使用无信号初始状态初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: true to set the initial state signaled; false to set the initial state to nonsignaled.
trans-unit.target: 若要将初始状态设置为终止，则为 true；若要将初始状态设置为非终止，则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> class with a Boolean value indicating whether to set the intial state to signaled.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个指示是否将初始状态设置为有信号的布尔值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: true to set the initial state to signaled; false to set the initial state to nonsignaled.
trans-unit.target: 若要将初始状态设置为终止，则为 true；若要将初始状态设置为非终止，则为 false。

trans-unit.source: The number of spin waits that will occur before falling back to a kernel-based wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 在回退到基于内核的等待操作之前发生的自旋等待数量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> class with a Boolean value indicating whether to set the intial state to signaled and a specified spin count.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个指示是否将初始状态设置为有信号和指定自旋计数的布尔值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="spinCount" /> is less than 0 or greater than the maximum allowed value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="spinCount" /> 小于 0 或大于允许的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 类的当前实例使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法使 <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 为 true 则释放托管资源和非托管资源；为 false 则仅释放非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most of the members of <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>, <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim.Dispose%2A> is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数的成员不同<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>，<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim.Dispose%2A>不是线程安全的不能与此实例的其他成员同时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the event is set.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否已设置事件。

trans-unit.source: true if the event has is set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了事件，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the event to nonsignaled, which causes threads to block.
trans-unit.target: 将事件状态设置为非终止，从而导致线程受阻。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim.Reset%2A> can be called concurrently with all members except <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim.WaitHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim.Reset%2A> 可以调用与除外的所有成员同时<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim.WaitHandle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the event to signaled, which allows one or more threads waiting on the event to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 将事件状态设置为有信号，从而允许一个或多个等待该事件的线程继续。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of spin waits that will occur before falling back to a kernel-based wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取在回退到基于内核的等待操作之前将发生的自旋等待数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of spin waits that will occur before falling back to a kernel-based wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 返回在回退到基于内核的等待操作之前将发生的自旋等待数量。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 为止。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 为止。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将阻塞，直到当前实例无限期的调用方是设置。

trans-unit.source: The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.
trans-unit.target: 如果该事件处于当前设置状态，调用方将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超出最大等待者数

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />(-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待的毫秒数，或为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1)，表示无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> is set, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 为止，同时使用 32 位带符号整数测量时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> was set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 是一个非 -1 的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超出最大等待者数

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> to observe.
trans-unit.target: 要观察的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> receives a signal, while observing a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 收到信号为止，同时观察 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将阻塞，直到当前实例无限期的调用方是设置。

trans-unit.source: The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.
trans-unit.target: 如果该事件处于当前设置状态，调用方将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超出最大等待者数

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> was canceled.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 已取消。

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed or the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 该对象已被释放，或者创建了 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> 已被释放。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 表示等待毫秒数的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，或表示 -1 毫秒（无限期等待）的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> is set, using a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> to measure the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 为止，同时使用 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 测量时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> was set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 为 -1 毫秒以外的负数，表示无限期超时。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds in <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 中的毫秒数大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超出最大等待者数

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />(-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待的毫秒数，或为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1)，表示无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> to observe.
trans-unit.target: 要观察的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> is set, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the time interval, while observing a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 为止，并使用 32 位带符号整数测量时间间隔，同时观察 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> was set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> was canceled.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 已取消。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 是一个非 -1 的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超出最大等待者数

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed or the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 该对象已被释放，或者创建了 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> 已被释放。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 表示等待毫秒数的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，或表示 -1 毫秒（无限期等待）的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> to observe.
trans-unit.target: 要观察的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> is set, using a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> to measure the time interval, while observing a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 为止，并使用 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 测量时间间隔，同时观察 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> was set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> was canceled.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 已取消。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 为 -1 毫秒以外的负数，表示无限期超时。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds in <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 中的毫秒数大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超出最大等待者数

trans-unit.source: The object has already been disposed or the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 该对象已被释放，或者创建了 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> 已被释放。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 的基础 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> event object fore this <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 的基础 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim" /> 事件对象。

trans-unit.source: Accessing this property forces initialization of an underlying event object if one hasn't already been created.
trans-unit.target: 访问此属性强制初始化基础事件对象，如果尚未创建一个。

trans-unit.source: To simply wait on this <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>, the public Wait methods should be preferred.
trans-unit.target: 只需等待此<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>，公共等待方法应为首选。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to dispose the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim> instance after accessing this property, in order to prevent a resource leak.
trans-unit.target: 建议释放<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim>后访问此属性中，为了防止资源泄漏的实例。
